projects.title: SharePlate
projects.bodyText:
- Platform to reduce food waste by connecting restaurants with NGOs
 - Features: Real-time food listings, reservation management, location-based search, user authentication
 - Technologies: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Google Maps API

projects.title: Project Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- Web application for project management with dual user roles
 - Features: Project creation, task assignment, verification system, milestone tracking
 - Technologies: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Java-based web application using JSP, Servlets, JDBC, and MySQL
 - Features: Patient records management, appointment scheduling, billing, user authentication
 - Technologies: Java, JSP, Servlets, JDBC, MySQL

projects.title: Shortest Path Simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Interactive visualization of BFS, DFS, and Dijkstra's algorithms
 - Features: Interactive map, algorithm selection, step-by-step visualization, algorithm comparison
 - Technologies: React.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript

projects.title: Network Visualizer
projects.bodyText:
- Educational platform for visualizing networking concepts
 - Features: Line coding, TCP/UDP traffic analysis, DNS/HTTP visualization, subnet calculator
 - Technologies: React.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript
